tool.name: Box
tool.description: : Sets the center and the size of a rectangular parallelepiped box around a selection of residues found in a given PDB. The residue identifiers that compose the selection (i.e. binding site) are extracted from a second PDB.

param.name: input_pdb_path
param.label: input PDB file
param.help: PDB protein structure for which the box will be build. Format: [input].pdb

param.name: resid_pdb_path
param.label: input PDB file
param.help: PDB file containing a selection of residue numbers mappable to 'input_pdb_path'. Format: [input].pdb

param.name: outname_output_pdb_path
param.label: output PDB name
param.help: PDB protein structure coordinates including the annotation of the box center and size as REMARKs Format: [output].pdb

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: offset
param.label: offset
param.help: between the last residue atom and the box boundary.

param.name: box_coordinates
param.label: box_coordinates
param.help: Add box coordinates as 8 ATOM records.

param.name: restart
param.label: restart
param.help: [WF property] Do not execute if output files exist.
